description.narrative: to build the capacity of government health officials to implement collaborative RCCE interventions to mitigate the spread of COVID-19 and future disease outbreaks

title.narrative: MALCOV: Malaria as a risk factor for COVID-19 (LSHTM)

description.narrative: to assess whether malaria infection affects the clinical course of COVID-19 in Kenya and Burkina Faso

description.narrative: to deepen decision makers’ understanding of the gendered impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, by synthesizing evidence on economic and social responses, and identifying evidence-based solutions to address gender inequities
